The photo was published on Facebook on J: 2020, and was accompanied by a misleading caption.
The caption in Hindi translated to Engli: the estranged wife of Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi, attending the protest in Shaheen Bagh to collect Rs. 500.
The photo had been circulating since 201: during Jashodaben's participation in a hunger strike in Mumbai to protest the demolition of slums.
A reverse image search on Google found t: language newspaper Deccan Chronicle, dated February 13, 2016, which confirmed its authenticity and the context in which it was originally taken.
